name: Tape Pop - Men
description:
"I let my tape knock, till my tape pops".  This t-shirt is for anyone that remembers when cassette tapes were our main source of storing music & how upset we'd all get when our tape ribbon popped.

:: 4.5 OZ. 100% RING SPUN COTTON; PRESHRUNK
:: TUBULAR CONSTRUCTION 
:: SHOULDER-TO-SHOULDER TAPE 
:: DOUBLE-NEEDLE SLEEVE AND BOTTOM HEM

name: Represent - McNair
description:
We are all the same, yet different. We've received our scars and earned our stripes. We all have PRIDE, but what do you represent?

10% of net profits are donated to NC A&T State University

:: 4.5 oz. 100% ring spun cotton; preshrunk 
:: Tubular construction
:: Shoulder-to-shoulder tape
:: Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
